RelatedSentence: COEUR d'ALENE , IDAHO ( AP ) - Authorities say a body found in the woods near Coeur d'Alene may be linked to an eastern Washington state investigation .
The Coeur d'Alene Press reports the body was recovered Friday near Fernan Lake Road after Spokane police investigators received a tip .
